product_description: Milliken WellBAC® cushion backing, offers enhanced underfoot comfort, acoustic and wear performance.
recyclable_percentage_description: Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program provides recycling options for both installation waste and end-of-life - locally in both Australia and New Zealand.
recyclable_offcuts_description: All Off cuts can be recycled through Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program.
recycling_process_description: Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program provides recycling options for both installation waste and end-of-life - locally in both Australia and New Zealand. The waste carpet tiles are re-manufactured into 'Renasci' - a resilient flooring product made from 80% carpet waste and 20% soft plastic waste.
reusable_description: Milliken carpet tiles are installed with pressure-sensitive glue to enable ease of removal and reuse. Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program provides a "No Landfill Guarantee".
end_of_life_program_description: Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program provides recycling options for both installation waste and end-of-life. https://www.milliken.com/en-au/businesses/floor-covering/mpact-our-planet/n-xt-life
minimisation_design_strategy: Milliken Design Studio offers detailed seaming diagrams and rendered floor plans, including 2D layouts for carpet placement to optimise material use and reduce waste. This service is complimentary.
modern_slavery_comments: Milliken has established a comprehensive governance and ethics process, including oversight from both Management and the Board, to ensure compliance and mitigate risks. The company issues an annual Modern Slavery Statement that outlines the measures taken by the Milliken group to prevent slavery and human trafficking within its business operations and supply chain.
factory_finished_description: Manufactured under ISO 9001 Quality Management System and ISO 14001 Environmental Management System
other_comments:
1. Milliken Social Impact: https://www.milliken.com/en-au/businesses/floor-covering/inspire-me/community-engagement
 
2. M/PACT Carbon Offset Program: https://www.milliken.com/en-au/businesses/floor-covering/mpact-our-planet/carbon-neutral-products

3. N/XT LIFE Circularity Program: https://www.milliken.com/en-au/businesses/floor-covering/mpact-our-planet/n-xt-life

4. Science Based Targets Initiative: Near Term - 1.5°C by 2030 | Long Term - 1.5°C by 2050 | Net Zero  -  https://sciencebasedtargets.org/target-dashboard

5. Ecovadis Gold: https://ecomedes.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/client-data/milliken/Milliken+Ecovadis+Scorecard.pdf

6. Works with WELL: https://directory.wearewell.com/products/9a325db5-5ba5-4a91-9086-171fc1bab113

7. Third-Party Certifications: https://www.milliken.com/en-au/businesses/floor-covering/mpact-our-planet/third-party-certifications

reusable_description: Milliken carpet tiles are installed with pressure-sensitive glue to enable ease of removal and reuse. Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program provides a "No Landfill Guarantee".
end_of_life_program_description: Milliken N/XT Life Circularity Program provides recycling options for both installation waste and end-of-life. https://www.milliken.com/en-au/businesses/floor-covering/mpact-our-planet/n-xt-life
minimisation_design_strategy: Milliken Design Studio offers detailed seaming diagrams and rendered floor plans, including 2D layouts for carpet placement to optimise material use and reduce waste. This service is complimentary.
modern_slavery_comments: Milliken has established a comprehensive governance and ethics process, including oversight from both Management and the Board, to ensure compliance and mitigate risks. The company issues an annual Modern Slavery Statement that outlines the measures taken by the Milliken group to prevent slavery and human trafficking within its business operations and supply chain.
factory_finished_description: Manufactured under ISO 9001 Quality Management System and ISO 14001 Environmental Management System
other_comments:
